details.title: Bedroom TV making noise
details.description: Mr. Murray stated on the phone that a gang of toddlers broke the tv. Do Not Enter the room without knocking 3 times

details.title: Check with fire company about upcoming inspection
details.description: Call the fire local fire house and ask them to verify that the inspection is scheduled for tuesday of next week

details.title: Deck has damage to the liner
details.description: Schedule a time for the pool installation company to come out and repair the liner near the area deck.

details.title: Frontdesk computer broken and needs to be replaced
details.description: I can't get the computer to work at the front desk so we need to get the IT people out here asap to get it replaced.
